title: modal
content: # `prefect.infrastructure.provisioners.modal` ## Classes ### `ModalPushProvisioner` A infrastructure provisioner for Modal push work pools. **Methods:** #### `console` ```python theme={null} console(self) -> Console ``` #### `console` ```python theme={null} console(self, value: Console) -> None ``` #### `provision` ```python theme={null} provision(self, work_pool_name: str, base_job_template: Dict[str, Any], client: Optional['PrefectClient'] = None) -> Dict[str, Any] ``` Provisions resources necessary for a Modal push work pool. **Args:** * `work_pool_name`: The name of the work pool to provision resources for * `base_job_template`: The base job template to update **Returns:** * A copy of the provided base job template with the provisioned resources
